NXevent_data.time_of_flight: {A list of time of flight for each event as it comes in. This list is for all pulses with information to attach to a particular pulse located in events_per_pulse.}?
NXevent_data.pixel_number: {There will be extra information in the NXdetector to convert pixel_number to detector_number. This list is for all pulses with information to attach to a particular pulse located in events_per_pulse.}?
NXevent_data.pulse_time: {The time that each pulse started with respect to the offset}?
NXevent_data.events_per_pulse: {This connects the index "i" to the index "j". The jth element is the number of events in "i" that occured during the jth pulse.}?
NXevent_data.pulse_height: {If voltages from the ends of the detector are read out this is where they go. This list is for all events with information to attach to a particular pulse height. The information to attach to a particular pulse is located in events_per_pulse.}?
